spec_data.Name: perl-POE-Component-Server-HTTP
spec_data.Description:
POE::Component::Server::HTTP (PoCo::HTTPD) is a framework for building
custom HTTP servers based on POE. It is loosely modeled on the ideas of
apache and the mod_perl/Apache module.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:55:05 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Foundation of a POE HTTP Daemon
